description.raw:
Two tests are failing via timeouts on the dart build:

* [PhysicsEngines/HeightmapTest.Volume/3](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/48/testReport/junit/(root)/INTEGRATION_heightmap/test_ran/)
* [INTEGRATION_joint_revolute](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/48/testReport/junit/(root)/INTEGRATION_joint_revolute/test_ran/)

The heightmap Volume test was added recently, but it doesn't work with dart and causes the test to fail via timeout. This pull request disables that test.

The `INTEGRATION_joint_revolute` has been failing sometimes. When it passes, it takes about 236 seconds, while the timeout is 240 seconds. This pull request also increases the timeout for that test.

A [dart4 jenkins build shows these tests are fixed](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/47/).
description.html:
Two tests are failing via timeouts on the dart build:

  • PhysicsEngines/HeightmapTest.Volume/3
  • INTEGRATION_joint_revolute

The heightmap Volume test was added recently, but it doesn't work with dart and causes the test to fail via timeout. This pull request disables that test.

The INTEGRATION_joint_revolute has been failing sometimes. When it passes, it takes about 236 seconds, while the timeout is 240 seconds. This pull request also increases the timeout for that test.

A dart4 jenkins build shows these tests are fixed.
